statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.BMBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.BMBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMBrandImage ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BrandID, ImageType, ImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BrandID#, #ImageType#, #ImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMBrandImage SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, ImageType = #ImageType# , ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
